full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

# EE520-241289 - Landscape Maintenance

### Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** WS4328901859
**Publication Date:** December 11, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** Thursday, January 18, 2024 at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time

**Tender Details**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the National Battlefields Commission (NBC) publishes a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Landscaoe Maintenance located in Québec, Québec, Canada.

### Services Required

The services required include:

* Cleaning services for parks and outdoor public venues
* Landscape maintenance and upkeep as detailed in the Statement of Work in Annex A

### Tender Status

The tender for Landscape Maintenance is CLOSED.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others.

### Regions of Opportunity

This tender applies to the following regions:

* Québec, Québec, Canada

### Contact Information

Emmanuelle Marchand
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
emmanuelle.marchand@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18247195?extsite=MTgyNDcxOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Notice

Please note that this tender is a competitive procurement and the contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder. Interested parties are advised to register and bid online.

### Attachments

No attachments will be provided.

### Description

As detailed in the Statement of Work in Annex A, successful bidder(s) will be responsible for the acquisition of Landscape Maintenance. Winning bidder(s) will engage in cantacts with the National Battlefields Commission for the provision of landscape maintenance. The selected service provider, through our services, will provide maintenance services as required. The area to be responsible for will be further defined in the SAP S/4 fianl documentation.
